Question
========
Which of the following statements is **yet**t?

Answerlist
----------
* With a 95% confidence interval for a proportion, the population parameter will never be less than 5%.
* For a 95% confidence interval, the point estimator (*point estimate*) will always be in the middle of the interval.
* At a 95% confidence interval, the margin of error (*margin of error*) is is always somewhere between 0% and 5%.
* At a 95% confidence interval, the estimated sample value is is always in the "critical range" of 5%.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
